Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
Whenever Dribble Bomber or another creature enters the battlefield under you control, target creature can't block this turn.
notes:
R, Sacrifice an artifact: Goblin Dribbler deals 1 damage to each opponent. If it's a trophy, Goblin Dribbler deals 3 damage instead.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under you control, target creature can't block this turn.

Whenever a creature you control dies, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
